wikipedia_page.main: Joe Ambler (12 February 1860 – 10 February 1899) was an English professional first-class cricketer who made eight appearances in county cricket during the 1880s, playing for both Yorkshire and Somerset. A right-handed batsman and right-arm fast-medium paced bowler, Ambler also kept wicket on occasion.
